Title: Father of the Bob
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Steven Davis, Kelvin Yu
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: At Bob's father's Christmas party, Bob and "Big Bob" rehash an old argument and try to outdo each other in the kitchen. Meanwhile, the kids compete to find the best gift for their dad.
